summary: App admin/members management and file search UI: fix text-based file search, ensure default first admin is visible/undeletable, and adjust UI layout by removing unused divs and repositioning a span; bump version to 0.2.68.
architectural_notes: Search behavior: case-insensitive substring matching for text-based file search.
known_issues: Build attempt failed once with generic 'AI was unable to fulfill your request' error; may need retry/diagnostics if it recurs.

existing_features.title: Fix the file search feature so typing into the File Manager search bar returns matching files/folders using case-insensitive substring matching, instead of returning no results.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix file search logic so text-based search finds files using case-insensitive substring matching
Ensure the default first logged-in user is a visible Members admin and cannot be deleted
UI change: remove two selected div elements and move the selected span into Element 1's former position

projectName: Fix file search to return results using case-insensitive substring matching
